translations: 逐步侵占（侵犯），蚕食；侵占（土地）

sentences.sentence: I did not mean to encroach upon your property.
sentences.translation: 我并不想侵占你的财产。

sentences.sentence: I won't encroach on your time any longer.
sentences.translation: 我不会再占用你的时间了。

sentences.sentence: He never allows work to encroach upon his family life.
sentences.translation: 他从不让工作扰乱他的家庭生活。
